item.title: NTA CUET PG 2025 Online Form
item.description: National Testing Agency (NTA) has released the Common University Entrance Test CUET PG 2024 online application for admission 2025 will start from 02 January 2025 and the last date to apply will be 08 February 2025. Various Institution are participating in CUET PG 2025,
